sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import '../style.css'; function SideMenu() { useEffect(() => { let arrow = document.querySelectorAll(".arrow"); for (var i = 0; i < arrow.length; i++) { arrow[i].addEventListener("click", (e)=>{ let arrowParent = e.target.parentElement.parentElement; arrowParent.classList.toggle("showMenu"); }); } let sidebar = document.querySelector(".sidebar"); let sidebarBtn = document.querySelector(".bx-menu"); console.log(sidebarBtn); sidebarBtn.addEventListener("click", ()=>{ sidebar.classList.toggle("close"); }); },[]) return (
